threepio.tabler
Class TableReorderer

java.lang.Object
  threepio.tabler.TableReorderer

public class TableReorderer
extends java.lang.Object

Table Reorderer orders Tables based on information on where they should be.

Author:
jhoule

Method Detail

reOrder

public static ModelTable reOrder(ModelTable table,
                                 java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> paired)
re-orders a Model Table based on a HashMap of item names. the keys are items that are to be moved. the values are the items that they should follow.

Parameters:
table - - the Table to re-order.
paired - - the map of changes to make to the table.
Returns:
the Table, re-ordered.

tableMoveByKey

private static void tableMoveByKey(Table table,
                                   java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String other)
                            throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
moves items in a table based on the key of the items. The item named name is placed based on the item named other

Parameters:
table - - the table to do the move in.
name - - the name of the item to be moving.
other - - the name of the item to do the move based around.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - - when either the item to move or the item to base movement on are not in the table.
